page.title: 15CHESTERTON-NEWSPAPER ANGLE
page.content: News and events in and around the village of Chesterton are covered by several local newspapers especially the Leamington Courier.In recent years most of the news concerning the village has been about the effort to restore the windmill to full working order.There have been articles and photographs showing the progress of the work and detailing fundraising for the project.Other items of news have covered the discovery of Roman skeletons in a field, the closing of the Chesterton Water Company, a fatal accident on Chesterton Hill, restoration of the tombs and monuments in the church,the award given to the windmill project in European Heritage Year,the publication of Mrs. N.'s book, the Preservation Order put on Honeybee Cottages and the fact that there is no local council connection.
